alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 23 at 4:08AM MST until December 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Colorado. * WHEN...From this evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
